Welcome to CitySurfer

About CitySurfer

When visiting a new city you may find yourself lost. But what if you had a friend, someone to guide you around, show you their favorite places, in exchange for friendship, and a life long love for adventure.

Safety

Explore local experiences, guided adventures, food tours, and more — all powered by our trusted community of locals. Both parties will be screened and all communication regarding meeting locations should be discussed on the SurfBoard Platform.
